product_name: Mountain Khakis Lounge Pants - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The prescription for a great day requires you to wear the Mountain Khakis Lounge Pants each morning. Brushed flannel feels like butter against your skin, allowing you to ease gently into your day.
